title: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Tampa Bay Rays left fielder Guillermo Heredia runs into the outfield wall while attempting to catch a home run hit by Boston Red Sox first baseman Sam Travis during a baseball game in St. Petersburg, Florida, on Monday, July 22. Hide Caption 1 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Roman Svichkar of Ukraine, left, lunges at Daniel Jerent of France during the men's epee team competition final at the FIE World Fencing Championships in Budapest, Hungary, on July 22. Hide Caption 2 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Jonathan Castroviejo, left, and Geraint Thomas, right, congratulate Egan Bernal as he celebrates winning the 106th Tour de France in Paris, on Sunday, July 28. Bernal is the first rider from Colombia to win the Tour. Hide Caption 3 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Clyde Lewis of Australia dives off of the starting block during the men's 200 meter freestyle final of the FINA World Swimming Championships in Gwangju, South Korea, on Tuesday, July 23. Hide Caption 4 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Green Bay Packers linebacker Curtis Bolton rides a kid's bicycle to the first day of training camp in Green Bay, Wisconsin, on Thursday, July 25. Hide Caption 5 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Riley McCusker of the United States competes in the uneven bars during the women's gymnastics qualification and team final on Day 1 of the Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, on Saturday, July 27. Hide Caption 6 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Viacheslav Kolesnikov of Ukraine dives during the men's high diving competition at the FINA World Swimming Championships in Gwangju, South Korea, on Wednesday, July 24. Hide Caption 7 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos A cat disrupts play in the second half of a soccer game between Tigres UANL and the Real Salt Lake in Salt Lake City, Utah, on July 24. Hide Caption 8 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Mookie Betts of the Boston Red Sox is showered in Gatorade after the Boston Red Sox defeated the New York Yankees 10-5 at Fenway Park on Friday, July 26. Hide Caption 9 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos From left, England players Joe Root, Jason Roy, Jonny Bairstow and Moeen Ali appeal for the wicket of Gary Wilson, which is given after review, during a cricket match between England and Ireland at Lord's Cricket Ground in London, England, on Friday, July 26. Hide Caption 10 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos A butterfly flutters nearby as Baltimore Ravens defensive back Justin Bethel reaches for the ball during NFL training camp in Owings Mills, Maryland, on Friday, July 26. Hide Caption 11 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos United States' swimmer Caeleb Dressel competes in the men's 100m butterfly final at the FINA World Swimming Championships in Gwangju, South Korea, on Saturday, July 27. The 22 year-old Dressel took home the gold medal and broke a decade-old World Record held by Michael Phelps. Hide Caption 12 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Red Bull's Max Verstappen crosses the finish line to win the F1 German Grad Prix as his team celebrates in Hockenheim, Germany, on Sunday, July 28. Hide Caption 13 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Alexander Zverev of Germany and Nikoloz Basilashvili of Georgia play in their semifinal match of the Hamburg Open in Hamburg, Germany, on Saturday, July 27. Hide Caption 14 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Rosive Silgado competes in the women's snatch weightlifting 59 kg event at the Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, on Sunday, July 28. Hide Caption 15 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Sarah Piampiano of the United States, left, dumps beer on Susie Cheetham of Great Britain while celebrating on the podium of the Ironman Hamburg in Hamburg, Germany, on Sunday, July 28. Hide Caption 16 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Nozomi Okuhara of Japan serves against Akane Yamaguchi in their women's singles final badminton match at the Japan Open in Chofu, Tokyo, on July 28. Hide Caption 17 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Indiana Fever's Erica Wheeler cries as she holds up the WNBA All-Star game MVP trophy in Las Vegas, Nevada, on Saturday, July 27. Hide Caption 18 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Anthony Rizzo of the Chicago Cubs scores while colliding with catcher Stephen Vogt of the San Francisco Giants during an MLB game at Oracle Park in San Francisco on July 22. Hide Caption 19 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Colombia's Egan Bernal, wearing the overall leader's yellow jersey and other cyclists ride past the Arc de Triomphe during the last stage of the Tour de France in Paris, on July 28. Hide Caption 20 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Australia's Emma McKeon competes in a heat for the women's 100m butterfly during the FINA World Swimming Championships in Gwangju, South Korea, on Sunday, July 21. Hide Caption 21 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Cavalry FC defender Mason Trafford, right, holds Vancouver Whitecaps forward Joaquin Ardaiz during the second half of a soccer match at BC Place Stadium in Vancouver, Canada, on July 24. Hide Caption 22 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos A man jumps from a 22-meter (72-foot) high bridge during the annual traditional high-diving competition near the town of Gjakova, Kosovo, on July 22. Hide Caption 23 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Esava Ratugolea of the Geelong Cats runs the ball during the round 19 AFL match between the Sydney Swans and the Geelong Cats at Sydney Cricket Ground in Sydney, Australia, on Sunday, July 28. Hide Caption 24 of 26

Photos: What a shot! 26 amazing sports photos Atlanta Braves center fielder Ronald Acuna Jr., right, steals second base ahead of a tag by Philadelphia Phillies shortstop Jean Segura during an MLB game at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, on July 26. Hide Caption 25 of 26
description: Take a look at 26 amazing sports photos from July 21 to July 28.
